comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on August 17, 2022, 06:37:22 PMThings will be just going to be confusing if there will be that much tokens or coins just as what you're saying if each of the industry has it. I think op is not even referring to industries,  but to our individual selfs,  like me and you,  op is saying that we all should individually create our own coin so as to build and have our own economy and be rich.But my question to you @op,  if every single one of use create a coin, that is -All the farmers create their coin individuallyAll the welders create their coin individuallyAll the fisher men, the boat engineersThe painters,  the web developers,  the graphic designers, the transportation workers,  the delivery guys,  hair stylist,  the barbers,  the meat sellers, the landlords,  even the bad boys on the street that have no form of handwork or business etc.If all this people create their own coins individually,  who is going to be buying the coin,  which exchange will the coins be listed on?The truth is that, not everybody will be rich,  yes,  no matter what,  there will always be poor people, as unfortunate as it sounds,  it the simple truth,  there can never be a world where everybody is rich and no poor man anywhere.
